about_the_game:
In a world undergoing constant change, step into the shoes of a young hero and illuminate the mysteries of this universe. **Tona: Fallen Zenith** is an epic third-person action-adventure game, drawing inspiration from Aztec mythology.

Explore the diverse landscapes of Altonia, a mysterious world brimming with hidden secrets. From lush jungles to ancient temples, towering mountain ranges, and long-lost cities, every corner of this realm is crafted to captivate and awe. The environments are rich with detail and concealed treasures, inviting players to delve into the depths of forgotten stories.

Solve intricate puzzles and face off against formidable foes. The bestiary of Altonia is vast and varied, featuring creatures inspired by Aztec mythology, from wild beasts of the jungle to mystical guardians of ancient temples.

Armed with a weapon that takes on three distinct forms, shape your destiny and challenge the reign of the powerful. Each form provides unique advantages, allowing you to tailor your combat style to the different challenges you'll encounter on your journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590 with 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Tona: Fallen Zenith is a semi-realistic 3D game set in a semi-open world inspired by Aztec mythology. Players take on the role of Ehécatl, a young hunter from the Ytzicotla tribe, searching for answers about the world and its origins.
